alert.note: Alert for Clinch; Coastal Camden; Coastal Glynn; Echols; Inland Camden; Northeastern Charlton; Southern Ware; Western Charlton (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 13 at 7:16PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Nassau, Baker, northern Columbia, northeastern Suwannee, northern Duval, eastern Hamilton, Camden, south central Glynn, southeastern Echols, southeastern Ware, southeastern Clinch and southeastern Charlton Counties through 800 PM EDT... At 716 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong outflow wind gusts produced by thunderstorms along a line extending from 7 miles southwest of Jekyll Island to near Kings Ferry to near White Springs. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds around 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... St. Marys, Kingsland, Fernandina Beach, Jasper, Hilliard, Woodbine, Callahan, White Springs, Jacksonville International Arpt and Kings Bay Base. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM EDT for northern and northeastern Florida...and southeastern Georgia.

area.areaDesc: Clinch; Coastal Camden; Coastal Glynn; Echols; Inland Camden; Northeastern Charlton; Southern Ware; Western Charlton
